pages.thanks: SmashCricket - Thank You for Joining Our Community - Thank You Thank You for Connecting with SmashCricket! We appreciate you taking the time to reach out to us. Your input is valuable, and we're thrilled to have you as part of our passionate cricket community. Our team is committed to providing the best experience for our users, and your feedback or questions help us continue to improve and grow. We'll review your message and get back to you as soon as possible. In the meantime, feel free to explore more of SmashCricket and stay updated with the latest news, scores, and exciting developments in the world of cricket. Once again, thank you for connecting with us. We look forward to continuing to serve you and share our love for cricket. Return to Homepage

pages.index: SmashCricket - The Ultimate Cricket Gaming Experience - Home 18+ +91-913-6596999 smashcricket@gmail.com SmashCricket Home Why are we Join Peculiarities Last news Unleash the Power of Cricket Experience the ultimate cricket gaming adventure with SmashCricket. Dive into intense matches, perfect your batting and bowling skills, and lead your team to victory. Download now and join millions of cricket enthusiasts worldwide! Down-load a game Why Choose SmashCricket? SmashCricket offers a unique and immersive cricket gaming experience that stands out from the rest. Here’s why you’ll love it: Realistic Gameplay Feel the thrill of real cricket with lifelike graphics and authentic game mechanics. Multiple Game Modes Enjoy a variety of game modes, including tournaments, quick matches, and career mode. Customizable Teams Create and manage your dream team with a wide range of customization options. Regular Updates Stay engaged with frequent updates that bring new features and improvements. Join the Community Connect, Compete, Conquer Global Leaderboards Climb the global leaderboards and showcase your skills to the world. Can you become the top player? In-Game Chat Communicate with other players during matches, strategize, and make new friends. Tournaments Participate in exciting tournaments and win exclusive rewards. Prove your dominance on the field. Features That Excite Advanced Graphics Immerse yourself in high-definition graphics that make every match feel real. Dynamic Weather Conditions Experience the impact of changing weather on gameplay, making each match unique. Offline Mode Play your favorite game anytime, anywhere, even without an internet connection. Achievements and Rewards Unlock achievements and earn rewards as you progress through the game. Stay Updated Latest News and Updates Stay informed about the latest happenings in the world of SmashCricket. From new features to upcoming events, we keep you in the loop. Upcoming Features Get a sneak peek at the exciting new features we’re working on. Patch Notes Detailed information about the latest updates and bug fixes. Community Events Join special community events and challenges to earn exclusive in-game rewards. Support Need Help? Our dedicated support team is here to assist you with any issues or questions you may have. Visit our support page for FAQs, troubleshooting guides, and more. Contact Us Get in Touch Have questions or feedback? We’d love to hear from you! Fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible. pages.privacy-policy: SmashCricket - Protecting Your Privacy - Privacy Policy 18+ +91-913-6596999 smashcricket@gmail.com SmashCricket Home Why are we Join Peculiarities Last news Privacy Policy At SmashCricket, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you when you use our mobile application, website, and other online services (collectively, the "Services") or when you otherwise interact with us. By using the Services, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the Services. Information We Collect We collect information from and about users of our Services in several ways, including: Information You Provide to Us. We collect information that you provide to us when you register for an account, participate in a contest or promotion, contact us for customer service, or otherwise communicate with us. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and other information you choose to provide. Information We Collect Automatically. We automatically collect certain information about your use of the Services, including your IP address, device type, operating system, browser type, and the pages you visit. We may also collect information about your location, with your consent, to provide you with location-based features. Information from Third Parties. We may receive information about you from third parties, such as social media platforms, advertising partners, and analytics providers. We may combine this information with other information we collect about you. How We Use Your Information We may use your information for various purposes, including: To provide and improve the Services. To communicate with you, including to respond to your inquiries and send you promotional materials. To personalize your experience on the Services. To analyze and understand how the Services are used. To detect, prevent, and investigate fraud, security breaches, and other potentially prohibited or illegal activities. To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal process. How We Share Your Information We may share your information with third parties in the following circumstances: Service Providers. We may share your information with service providers that perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, analytics, and marketing. Advertising Partners. We may share your information with advertising partners to deliver targeted advertisements to you. Business Transfers. We may share your information in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our business. Legal and Safety Purposes. We may share your information to comply with legal process, to respond to claims or inquiries, to protect our rights and property, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of others. With Your Consent. We may share your information with your consent. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at smashcricket@gmail.com.
